name: Polymorph
flavor: Assume the form of a new creature.

purposeDescriptions.low: coaxes target creature into the form of a random new creature that you have knowledge of, which maintains their size, mass, intelligence, and casting ability
purposeDescriptions.mid: converts target creature into the form of a new creature of your choice for a time, which maintains their size, mass, intelligence, and casting ability
purposeDescriptions.high: forces target creature into the form of a new creature of your choice semi-permanently, which maintains their size, mass, intelligence, and casting ability
